title: View Definition
description: An Azure Managed Application View Definition.

contentVersion.description: A 4 number format for the version number of the view file. For example, 1.0.0.0.

displayName.description: The displayed title of the view.

version.description: The version of the platform used to render the view.

header.description: The header value of the overview blade.

description.description: The description of the overview blade.

commands.description: The array of toolbar buttons of the overview blade.

displayName.description: The displayed menu item of the view.

version.description: The version of the platform used to render the view.

charts.description: The array of charts of the metrics blade.

displayName.description: The displayed title of the view.

version.description: The version of the platform used to render the view.

createUIDefinition.description: The Create UI Definition schema for create custom resource command.

editUIDefinition.description: The Create UI Definition schema for edit custom resource command.

commands.description: The array of toolbar buttons of the CustomResources blade.

columns.description: The array of columns of the custom resource.

CustomResources.description: The configuration of a visualization for CustomResources.

displayName.description: The displayed title of the chart.

chartType.description: The visualization to use for this chart. (Defaults to line chart)

metrics.description: The metrics to plot on this chart.

aggregationType.description: The aggregation type to use for this metric.

namespace.description: Additional information to use when determining the correct metrics provider.

resourceTagFilter.description: The resource tags (OR'd) for which metrics would be displayed. This is on top of resource type filter.

resourceType.description: The resource type for which metrics would be displayed.

displayName.description: The displayed name of the command button.

icon.description: The icon of the command button.

createUIDefinition.description: The Create UI Definition schema for the command.

key.description: The key of the property to display in a view. If nested, use dot as delimiter.

displayName.description: The display name of the property to display in a view.

optional.description: If true, the column will not be displayed in a view by default.
